de.iss.mv2.client.gui

Class ServerSelectionControl

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.awt.Component
      • java.awt.Container
        • javax.swing.JComponent
          • de.iss.mv2.client.gui.ServerSelectionControl
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    AssistantStep, java.awt.event.ActionListener, java.awt.event.ComponentListener, java.awt.image.ImageObserver, java.awt.MenuContainer, java.io.Serializable, java.util.EventListener

    public class ServerSelectionControl
extends javax.swing.JComponent
implements java.awt.event.ActionListener, java.awt.event.ComponentListener, AssistantStep
    A dialog that helps the user to configure his client.
    Author:
    Marcel Singer
    See Also:
    Serialized Form
